title: Procurement of 163 Ashok Leyland New Engine Kits for the Sri Lanka Transport Board
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Nimal Siripala de Silva, the Minister of Transport and Civil Aviation, for the procurement of 163 Ashok Leyland New Engine Kits for the Sri Lanka Transport Board (SLTB), under the Indian Line of Credit, on repeat order basis, as per the recommendation of the Cabinet Appointed Negotiation Committee (CANC), was approved by the Cabinet.
